entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Alma
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mistook 03:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: S 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming south 40 gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
